title: Nocturnal
description: Nocturnal is a collection of words and imagery inspired by darkened skies and sleepless nights. it is a journey of healing and self-discovery whether love stays or leaves. it is dreaming with your eyes wide open while the rest of the world is hiding.--and when they ask me,are you afraid of the dark?i will remind them thatthereâ€™s nothing to fearwhen the night is a reasonwe can see how honesteverything shineswhile the rest of the worldis hiding.
author: Wilder Poetry
